summary: He never qualified it like that.

statements.quote: Now, if you have or had one of these plans before the Affordable Care Act came into law and you really like that plan, what we said was you could keep it if it hasn’t changed since the law was passed.  So we wrote into the Affordable Care Act you’re grandfathered in on that plan.

name: Obama only said you can keep your plan if it hasn't changed since the ACA passed
